interfaces

Interface FridgeI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FridgeComponent, FridgeConnector, FridgeInboundPort, FridgeOutboundPort

    public interface FridgeI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    The interface FridgeI defines the services to access Fridge state and its operations
    Author:
    Saad CHIADMI
